data.title: O’Brien – McCarthy
data.meta_description: Meghan O’Brien and Brian McCarthy, of Hoboken, N.J., were married Oct. 5, 2013, in Peapack Gladstone, N.J. Brian’s uncle, Thomas McCarthy, officiated.Meghan is the daughter of Lori O’Brien, of Warminster, Pa., and Richard O’Brien, of Yaphank, N.Y.Brian is the son of Holly McCarthy Cerretani and Brian McCarthy, of Boulder.Alyson and Katelyn O’Brien were the maids […]
data.text:
Meghan O’Brien and Brian McCarthy, of Hoboken, N.J., were married Oct. 5, 2013, in Peapack Gladstone, N.J. Brian’s uncle, Thomas McCarthy, officiated.

Meghan is the daughter of Lori O’Brien, of Warminster, Pa., and Richard O’Brien, of Yaphank, N.Y.

Brian is the son of Holly McCarthy Cerretani and Brian McCarthy, of Boulder.

Alyson and Katelyn O’Brien were the maids of honor; Kristin Sharp, Grace McCarthy and Hillary Gordon were the bridesmaids. Russ Olson was the best man; Dylan McCarthy, Ian Lennox, Shawn Hunt and Matthew O’Brien were groomsmen.

Meghan graduated from William Tennent High School in Warminster, Pa. She received a degree in international business from Northeastern University in Boston in 2008. She is a senior associate at PricewaterhouseCoopers in New York City.

Brian graduated from Boulder High School in 2003. He received his degree in music industry from Northeastern University in Boston in 2008. He is a manager of valet services at W Hotels.

The couple celebrated by spending two weeks in Koh Samui, Thailand.
